Name: Bujumbura Mairie
Description: The capital province of Burundi, Bujumbura Mairie is the largest city and the country s political and economic center.

Name: Bubanza
Description: Located in the western part of Burundi, Bubanza is known for its agricultural production, particularly coffee and bananas.

Name: Bururi
Description: Situated in the southern part of Burundi, Bururi is known for its rich agricultural activities and beautiful landscapes.

Name: Cankuzo
Description: A province in the eastern part of Burundi, Cankuzo is known for its mountainous terrain and agricultural production.

Name: Gitega
Description: Gitega is located in the central part of Burundi and is an important cultural and historical region of the country.

Name: Kayanza
Description: Located in the northern part of Burundi, Kayanza is a significant agricultural region known for its coffee plantations.

Name: Kirundo
Description: Kirundo is located in the northernmost part of Burundi and is an important agricultural region known for its production of maize, rice, and cassava.

Name: Makamba
Description: Makamba is situated in the southern part of Burundi, close to the border with Tanzania. It is known for its agricultural activities, including the production of rice and cassava.

Name: Muramvya
Description: Muramvya, located in the central part of the country, is an agricultural region with fertile soil and a focus on crop farming.

Name: Mwanza
Description: Mwanza, located in the southeastern part of Burundi, is known for its fertile lands and agricultural activities, including livestock farming.

Name: Ruyigi
Description: Ruyigi is located in the eastern part of Burundi and is known for its fertile soil and agricultural production, including crops like cassava and beans.
